title: USB Multiboot MINI Office 900MB Linux Plus
description:
YUMI-based Multiboot MINI OFFICE (880MB) Instructions and Documentation

 <a href=" http://www.gooplusplus.com/multiboot-2013-mini-office/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.gooplusplus.com/multiboot-2013-mini-office/</a>

This download uses PendriveLinux YUMI (Windows) to create a basic bootable USB file structure. From the Click-START (or Click-START-WinXP) menu, you will use YUMI only once to format the USB flash drive and install ("Try an Unlisted ISO") a single file empty.iso on the USB drive. After that, you will not need to use YUMI again. The real Linux and Tools distros will be installed on USB from the Click-START menu using a single 880MB self-extracting file.

This torrent will create a Windows directory usb-multiboot-mini-office with all setup files and documentation. There is no need to unzip or unrar anything. There are no keys or passwords. 

This MINI OFFICE USB multiboot system is under 880MB installed. You can add more Linux distributions to your USB flash drive by downloading more "addON" distros to your usb-multiboot-mini-office directory and then installing via the Click-START menu.

368 MB - Porteus KDE 2.1 Linux
124 MB - Puppy-Racy 5.5 Linux
106 MB - AVG Rescue CD
001 MB - Free DOS
234 MB - Hiren's Boot CD 15.2 lite
042 MB - Partition Wiz MiniTool 7.8

Optional add-on files:
	
Android, Antix, Bodhi, CrunchBBQ, Deepin, Elementary, GnuGuitarInix, Knoppix, Manjaro, Peppermint, Slitaz, Ubuntu, XBMCbuntu, Zorin ... and more
